attributes.action: TO CHANGE THE FAMILY LAW ACT 5.5 THAT EVERY CHILD MUST HAVE DIRECT CONTACT WITH BOTH PARENTS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i am involved in family proceedings and judges are using artical 5.5 to get round children having direct contact with both parents by saying wots in the best interest of the child and the childs welfare there is nothing in family law as i no to say that ALL !! CHILDREN SHOULD HAVE DIRECT CONTACT WITH BOTH PARENTS IN THE BEST INTEREST OF THE CHILD WOT EVER THE CIRCUMSTANSIS 

PLEASE SUPPORT THIS PETITION 
TROY POINTER

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
